item.title: Apple Closing Store in China for the First Time Ever
item.description: Apple is closing a retail store in China for the first time. Bloomberg’s Tom Giles explains why it’s a notable retreat for the iPhone maker. He joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (
